english.segment1: Patiently I wait. And all I can say. I need so much more of you. VERSE 1. In your light I'll stay. And I want you to drop me into your arms full of love. Take me where I can't go alone
english.segment2: CHORUS. Give this soul what it needs. I want life from you in me. Jesus your love lifts me up. You're all that I've been searching for. Everything I have is yours. Jesus your love lifts me up
english.segment3: VERSE2. I wait here for you to speak. Words that give new life to me. I know I could never have to much. when I am in a desperate place. You give light to my escape. and carry me when I am weak. Oh Lord it's you I seek
english.segment5: BRIDGE. Hold me close. When I fall down. I'm crying out. With out a sound
english.segment6: Hold me close. When I fall down. I'm crying out. Save me now
